name: Trash Taste: The Boys Order Pizza
name_original: Trash Taste: The Boys Order Pizza
description:
Wow! You became a guest on a great podcast! "Trash Taste", huh?

But who cares about the podcast itself, after the recording the boys got really hungry. We really should order something... Like pizza!

I've never made a game before, and this one took me 2 and a half weeks. It's nothing big, but I hope you like it!

  • A quick visual novel game with 7 endings
  • 3 Kinds of mostly Delicious Pizza!
  • S̷̲͆o̵̗͒m̸͇̏e̷̬̅t̶͚̃ḧ̴̡́i̵͆͜n̴̨̐g̷̱̋ ̸̠͝R̴̘̉e̵̯͆a̵̘͂l̵͎͘l̷͚͋ỹ̵̱ ̸̹̌D̷̨̒a̸̻̒r̶̥̈́k̷͔̔

This game is a burst of inspiration caused by the Trash Taste boys and their community. I'm really grateful to both, thank you for being such a powerful source of inspiration!

It is a love letter to the community. I loved making it and I hope you'll love it too!
